basic.description:
A detailed study of selected novels from 20th century French authors until 1945. Beauvoir, Camus, Céline, Cocteau, Colette, Gide, Proust, Sartre. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 324/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le roman français du 20e siècle I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN324; FREN424.
